MS MCQs

    Introduction to Dynamics 365 Marketing​ - Test your knowledge

    »

    1. What is a customer journey?

      The building and tracking of a marketing effort

      The path that a customer takes to obtain product support

      The 360-degree view of the whole customer profile


    2. Which two Dynamics apps would you integrate to get a full marketing and sales automation solution?

      Dynamics 365 Marketing and Dynamics 365 Sales

      Dynamics 365 Marketing and Dynamics 365 Commerce

      Dynamics 365 Marketing and Dynamics 365 Finance


    3. What are segments in Dynamics 365 Marketing?

      Defined and targeted groups of related contacts

      The division of different teams who live in a selected city

      The sections of customer information as displayed on forms
